API Collection# Common Unicode Characters

## [Topics](/documentation/AppKit/common-unicode-characters#topics)

### [Constants](/documentation/AppKit/common-unicode-characters#Constants)

[`var NSEnterCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsentercharacter)The enter character: `0x0003`[`var NSBackspaceCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsbackspacecharacter)The backspace character: `0x0008`[`var NSTabCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nstabcharacter)The tab character: `0x0009`[`var NSNewlineCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsnewlinecharacter)The newline character: `0x000a`[`var NSFormFeedCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsformfeedcharacter)The form feed character: `0x000c`[`var NSCarriageReturnCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nscarriagereturncharacter)The carriage return character: `0x000d`[`var NSBackTabCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsbacktabcharacter)The back tab character: `0x0019`[`var NSDeleteCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsdeletecharacter)The delete character: `0x007f`[`var NSLineSeparatorCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nslineseparatorcharacter)The line separator character: `0x2028`[`var NSParagraphSeparatorCharacter: Int`](/documentation/appkit/nsparagraphseparatorcharacter)The paragraph separator character: `0x2029`## [See Also](/documentation/AppKit/common-unicode-characters#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/AppKit/common-unicode-characters#Constants)

[`enum NSTextAlignment`](/documentation/appkit/nstextalignment)Constants that specify text alignment.[`enum NSWritingDirection`](/documentation/appkit/nswritingdirection)Constants that specify the writing direction.[Movement Codes](/documentation/appkit/movement-codes)The reason for a change of editing focus among text fields.
